Card.Name: Ornithopter
Card.RulesText: Flying

Card.Name: Maggot Carrier
Card.RulesText: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Ghoul
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Lord of the Undead
Card.RulesText: Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Gravedigger
Card.RulesText: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Delver
Card.RulesText: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

Card.Name: Academy Rector
Card.RulesText: When Academy Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Soul Warden
Card.RulesText: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

Card.Name: Monk Idealist
Card.RulesText: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Flickering Ward
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature As Flickering Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Flickering Ward. {W}: Return Flickering Ward to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Spirit Mirror
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Reflection tokens on the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Reflection creature token. {0}: Destroy target Reflection.

Card.Name: Enduring Renewal
Card.RulesText: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

Card.Name: Duress
Card.RulesText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Recurring Nightmare
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Card.Name: Grave Pact
Card.RulesText: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

Card.Name: Living Death
Card.RulesText: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Gerrard's Verdict
Card.RulesText: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

Card.Name: Vindicate
Card.RulesText: Destroy target permanent.

Card.Name: Phyrexian Altar
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Death Grasp
Card.RulesText: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

Card.Name: Scrubland
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)

Card.Name: Phyrexian Tower
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {B}{B}.

Card.Name: Marsh Flats
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Reflecting Pool
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
